original_text: And they made two rings of gold, and put them on the two ends of the breastplate, upon the border of it, which was on the side of the ephod inward.
korean_text: 또 금 고리 둘을 만들어 흉패 두 끝에 달았으니 곧 그 에봇을 마주한 안쪽 가장자리에 달았으며

sentences.original_text: And they made two rings of gold
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 금으로 두 개의 고리를 만들고

sentences.original_text: and put them on the two ends of the breastplate
which was on the side of the ephod inward
